name: sand-veil
caption: Sand Veil

effect.short: Increases [evasion]{mechanic:evasion} to 1.25× during a [sandstorm]{mechanic:sandstorm}.  Protects against sandstorm damage.
effect.full:
During a [sandstorm]{mechanic:sandstorm}, this Pokémon has 1.25× its [evasion]{mechanic:evasion}, and it does not take sandstorm damage regardless of type.

The evasion bonus does not count as a [stat modifier]{mechanic:stat-modifier}.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a sandstorm.

flavorText: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasion in a sandstorm.
